price: 4. Nous savons certes ce que la terre dévorera (de leurs dépouilles), et Nous avons un Livre où tout est conservé.
arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qad ʿalim'nā mā tanquṣu al-arḍu min'hum waʿindanā kitābun ḥafīẓun
